CatDescriptText: Cutline of possible related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 7, 1956, pg. C3, reads: "'A Child's Dream' - A child's dream of the night before Christmas was the theme of the pageant - party given by the Hayes School of Music pupils last week...- Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight children wearing light colored robes, including two with halos, enacting nativity scene, possibly for Christmas pageant in Hayes Music School with Christmas tree, another version
